product_overview: GainOS is a Progressive Web App (PWA) designed to assist underweight individuals in following a structured, healthy weight gain plan. The app provides comprehensive tracking for meals, weight, meal preparation, and daily packing, with a motivational scoring system to ensure accountability and progress.
core_goals: Enable users to consistently complete 8 meals daily (56 meals weekly) to support healthy weight gain.
Provide clear visual feedback on daily and weekly progress including calorie intake and weight milestones.
Offer an organized weekly meal prep checklist to simplify food preparation.
Facilitate daily packing reminders to ensure users take necessary meals and snacks when away from home.
Motivate users through a weekly scoring system to maintain consistency and adherence to the plan.
Enable offline functionality and installability as a PWA for seamless mobile usage.
key_features: Dashboard with progress ring displaying completed meals count, calorie intake bar, weight summary, weekly score, and quick access navigation.
Meal tracking interface listing 8 daily meals with status indicators (pending, completed, skipped, partial) and notes.
Weekly weight logging with optional photo capture and visual progress chart.
Weekly meal prep checklist of 9 predefined items to organize Sunday meal preparation.
Daily backpack checklist for items to carry including sandwiches, fruits, nuts, yogurts, water, and peanut butter.
Comprehensive weekly scoring system capped at 100 points across meals, meal prep, tracking consistency, and weight gain.
Weekly and monthly reports detailing meal completion, weight changes, and scoring summaries.
Historical calendar view of past days with access to prior records and trends.
User settings including goal weight, start date, themes (light/dark/system), and onboarding status.
PWA capabilities with offline support, service worker caching, and home screen installability.
user_flow_summary: User opens GainOS app and lands on the Dashboard to view daily meal completion and progress.
User navigates to 'Meals' to mark meals as completed, skipped, or partial, adding notes as needed.
Upon completing meals, user returns to Dashboard to see real-time updates on progress and scores.
Weekly routine includes weighing in under 'Weight' to record weight with optional photo and review progress graph.
User performs meal preparation on Sundays using the checklist in 'Meal Prep' to ensure readiness for the week.
Daily, user checks 'Backpack' to confirm necessary meal items are packed for work or outings.
User reviews weekly and monthly reports in 'Reports' and monitors historical trends in 'History'.
User adjusts personal settings and goals as needed in 'Settings'.
validation_criteria: The app must allow logging and state management of 8 meals per day with correct statuses and timestamps.
Weight records must include weekly entries with optional photo attachments and accurate progress calculations.
Meal prep and backpack daily checklists must reset and update correctly, with completion tracked per week and day respectively.
Weekly score calculation must accurately reflect meal completion, meal prep completion, tracking consistency, and weight progress.
The app must function offline with data persistence via IndexedDB and allow installation as a PWA.
User interface must be responsive, mobile-first, and provide immediate visual feedback for all user actions.
Reports and history views must correctly aggregate and display data over weekly and monthly periods.
Settings changes must persist and take effect, including theme modes and user goals.
All user data must remain local with no external data transmission or cloud synchronization.
App navigation must be intuitive with a fixed bottom navigation bar providing access to main app sections.

code_summary.description: PWA de Tracking para Aumento de Peso Saludable - Ayuda a personas con bajo peso a seguir un plan estructurado de aumento de peso saludable

features.name: Registro de Peso

features.name: Meal Prep
features.description: Checklist semanal de preparación con 9 items predefinidos para organizar comidas los domingos

features.name: Mochila Diaria
